SageTVPlugin.Name: MBDiamond
SageTVPlugin.Description:
MB Diamond Theme for SageTV V7.0.12 and up. Based loosely on some of the elements of Media Browser Diamond Theme and a bunch of updated
icons etc... It is a bit glossy and might not be for everyone.
SageTVPlugin.Author: jorton
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
1.63 - Corrected Thumbnail (Sorry Brent94Z) 1.62 - Corrected Guide Overlay issue and fixed Video Thumbnail background. 1.61 - Fixed the
real problem with the parent theme. 1.6 - Updated missing image for screen saver. 1.5-Updated theme.properties file to make compatible with 7.0.12 Beta.

included "Blue.zip" to revert easily from green back to blue and updated the sample photos. 1.2 various updates to icons and menu items. 1.1 update
